terms.title: Terms of Service & Privacy Policy
terms.welcomeDesc: By creating an account and using our services, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.

dataCollectionItems.1: We collect personal information including name, email, date of birth, gender, and contact details
dataCollectionItems.2: Health data including medical records, test results, and risk assessments are stored securely
dataCollectionItems.3: Your data is used to provide personalized diabetes risk assessments and health insights
dataCollectionItems.4: We may use anonymized, aggregated data for research and improving our AI models

dataSharingItems.1: If you have an assigned healthcare provider, your health data may be shared with them
dataSharingItems.2: We do not sell your personal information to third parties
dataSharingItems.3: Anonymized data may be used for medical research and public health studies
dataSharingItems.4: We may share data if required by law or to protect user safety

dataSecurityItems.1: We use industry-standard encryption to protect your data
dataSecurityItems.2: Access to your data is restricted to authorized personnel only
dataSecurityItems.3: Regular security audits and updates are performed
dataSecurityItems.4: You can request data deletion at any time through your account settings

researchAnalyticsItems.1: Your health data may be used (anonymized) to improve diabetes prediction models
researchAnalyticsItems.2: Aggregated statistics may be published in medical journals or research papers
researchAnalyticsItems.3: Individual identities are never disclosed in research publications
researchAnalyticsItems.4: You can opt-out of research participation in your account settings

yourRightsItems.1: Access your data at any time through your account
yourRightsItems.3: Export your data in a portable format
yourRightsItems.4: Delete your account and all associated data

terms.medicalDisclaimerDesc: This service provides risk assessments based on AI analysis and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult with qualified healthcare providers for medical decisions. The predictions are estimates and should not be used as the sole basis for medical decisions.

acknowledgmentItems.1: You have read and understood these terms
acknowledgmentItems.2: You consent to data collection and processing as described
acknowledgmentItems.4: You are at least 18 years old or have parental consent

support.failedToSend: Failed to send support message. Please try again.
